paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Ser23Asn, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: transthyretin amyloidosis with cardiac and peripheral neuropathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: fatigue, shortness of breath, peripheral neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report the fourth case of transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTR) Ser23Asn in a 41-year-old Ecuadorian male.

functional_data.summary: The Ser23Asn variant is associated with transthyretin amyloidosis, affecting both cardiac and peripheral systems.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family, as indicated by the pedigree spanning 7 generations.
variants.additional_notes: The patient underwent successful combined heart and liver transplant.
key_quotes: We add to the current ATTR literature that in patients with the rare Ser23Asn mutation, peripheral nerve in addition to cardiac involvement can occur.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
